reference.title: Overview Lookup Functions
reference.shortdesc: An overview of some functions for lookups.

section.title: HLOOKUP
section.p: This function looks up for a given value in the first row of a list (table), and returns the corresponding value from another row of the array.

plentry.pd: Required. The value that you want to look for in the first row of the list.
Required. The list that you want to search.
Required. The row number from the list, that you want the corresponding value to be returned from. The first row has number 1.
Optional. Possible values: TRUE (for the closest match) or FALSE (for exact matching).

section.title: VLOOKUP
section.p: This function looks up for a given value in the first column of a list (table) and returns the corresponding value from another column of the array.

plentry.pd: Required. The value that you want to look for, in the first column of the list.
Required. The list that you want to search.
Required. The column number from the list that you want the corresponding value to be returned from. The first column has number 1.
Optional. Possible values: TRUE (for the closest match) or FALSE (for exact matching).
